name: The Whooper
description:
A little adventure game made for Point and Click Jam. It was an experiment in making an adventure game in Unity and I had a limited amount of time, so it is very, very short, broken, and utterly lacking any polish, missing both animation and sound. More of a test project than anything, but I am happy to have people take a look.

The game is set on the Miramichi River of New Brunswick. A very rural area, it is easy to get away from people and find yourself in the deep forests that surround the area.
